title: Ukraine President’s Moves to End Russia Conflict Spark Protests
text:
KYIV, Ukraine—Thousands protested across Ukraine against President Volodymyr Zelensky’s efforts to end a five-year conflict with Russia, adding a domestic challenge to a novice leader who is also trying to contain fallout from his phone call with President Trump.

Protesters worry that Mr. Zelensky—encouraged by European leaders eager to improve ties with Russia—is acceding to Moscow’s demands. The Kremlin wants to reintegrate separatist regions it controls, starting with holding elections in the region of eastern Ukraine....
description: The demonstrations across Ukraine added a domestic challenge to a novice leader who is also trying to contain fallout from his phone call with President Trump.
